Trade/Device Name(s): IMMULITE® 2500 High Sensitivity C-Reactive Protein Immunoassay
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for IMMULITE 2500 High Sensitivity C-Reactive Protein Immunoassay for quantitative CRP measurement using chemiluminescent immunoassay on the IMMULITE 2500 analyzer.
Indications for Use Summary: For in vitro diagnostic use with the IMMULITE 2500 analyzer for quantitative measurement of C-reactive protein in serum or plasma as an aid in detecting infection, tissue injury, inflammatory disorders, and identifying individuals at risk for cardiovascular disease.
